name: MEME FIGHTER
description:
Because why play a good fighting game amiright?

MEME FIGHTER is a multiplayer fighting game similar to games like Street Fighter 5 and Mortal Kombat 11. MEME FIGHTER has graphics almost as good as Minecraft and has a frame rate of 2! MEME FIGHTER has 20 characters... and most of them are just re skins of other characters.

Playing MEME FIGHTER feels like playing DRAGON BALL FIGHTER Z with WAY too many mods enabled... like what the frick man just play the game.

MEME FIGHTER FEATURES:

SECRET CHARACTERS

12 CRAPPY STAGES I SPENT 2 MINUTES WORKING ON

POORLY RIGGED MODELS

DEAD MEMES

FORTNITE JOKES

NO FORTNITE CHARACTERS OR STAGES

SH*T AND MORE SH*T

AND SANS UNDERTALE

daddy, i would like to leave now
